channel.title: Systemd-free kicksecure
channel.description:
Hi, this is my first post here,
I really love Kicksecure and Whonix, so thank you to all for providing this.
I was thinking of distromorphing kicksecure for a metal install and wanted to avoid systemd. As many researchers agree that it can be a security issue.
Would it be possible to distromorph from Devuan? How many packages would need to be changed that rely on systemd?
Thanks
